subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: A referee who is not shy about awarding red and yellow cards  will officiate Friday’s United States-Costa Rica World Cup qualifier only days before the American team hosts Mexico.
snippet: A referee who is not shy about awarding red and yellow cards  will officiate Friday’s United States-Costa Rica World Cup qualifier only days before the American team hosts Mexico.
